alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 11:26AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Rutland, Windsor and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The primary focus will be for southern sections of Rutland and Windsor Counties, generally along and south of Route 4.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
